mapper.sql: id, username, password, email, flag, nickname, sex, age, telphone, images, isadmin
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (id, username, password, email, flag, nickname, sex, age, telphone, images, isadmin) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{images,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isadmin,jdbcType=BIT})

mapper.update:
update t_user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=BIT},
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=BIGINT},
telphone = #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
images = #{images,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isadmin = #{isadmin,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=BIT}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=BIGINT}, telphone = #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, images = #{images,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isadmin = #{isadmin,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select count(*) FROM t_user u WHERE u.username =#{username}
select count(*) FROM t_user u WHERE u.email =#{email}
select username,password FROM t_user u WHERE u.flag = 1 and u.username =#{username} or u.telphone = #{username}
select * FROM t_user u WHERE u.username =#{username} AND u.password =#{password} AND u.flag = 1;
select * FROM t_user u WHERE u.username =#{username} AND u.flag = 1
